name: [Group18]Hot Potato
description: This project is supervised and supported by Howest:Digital Arts and Entertainment(DAE). The five developpers of this project are 2nd year DAE students. The idea is to make a fun couch game to enjoy in the company of other people. This means the game was made with local-coop and/or local-pvp, quick and easy to get into and funny and engaging gameplay in mind.
